pages.body:
# Trigger Warning

A label for content that might overly offend someone, or cause them to recall a traumatic incident.

Used to alert people when an internet post, book, article, picture, video, audio clip, or some other media could potentially cause extremely negative reactions (such as post-traumatic flashbacks or self-harm) due to its content. Common examples include: gore, violence, or sexual assault.

Sometimes abbreviated as "TW."
